about:
I am a web developer at the University of Evry, where I am pursuing a professional degree in MIAW.


I have been developing websites, mobile applications, software, and mobile games for a few years, whether for personal or professional projects. I really enjoy development; it is something that has fascinated me since I started.
Each project I complete makes me proud of the work I have accomplished.
I keep myself informed about new technologies every day and my latest passion is artificial intelligence, which fascinates me.
My latest ongoing project is the development of an LLM, based on Facebook's AI model named Llama.
Apart from development, I am also passionate about sports.
